attributes.action: Move gyms to essential services to help assist mental and physical health
attributes.additional_details: If elite sports are allowed to carry on its the basic right for anyone who wants to keep fit. Going out for a run / cycle in winter is just not an option for a lot of people.
attributes.background: Move gyms to essential services so people can train and keep fit in winter during the lockdown. It will help fight key issues like obesity and mental health of the nation. Not forgetting assisting the health and fitness industry.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Keep gyms and leisure facilities open during any lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556956

Prevent gyms closing due to a spike in Covid 19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/333869

The Committee will be holding a debate on Covid-19 restrictions on gyms and sport on Monday 23 November. You will be able to watch the debate on Parliament TV at 4.30pm: https://www.parliamentlive.tv/Commons
